2104430.name: Super Galaxy Games
2104430.description:
Super Galaxy Games is an online multiplayer platformer that combines the feel of classic 3D platformers with modern visuals and limitless, community-driven content.

Classic Feel, Modern Control

The gameplay is designed to be instantly familiar and fun. With tight, responsive controls that are easy to pick up, you'll be running, crouching, sliding, twirling, and wall-jumping through levels in no time. While the basics are simple, the move set has enough depth to allow for true skill expression and high-level competition in game modes like Race & Survival.

Build. Share. Play.

The heart of the game is its robust in-game editor. We've broken down classic platforming obstacles into their most basic, dynamic components, giving you a powerful toolbox to build with.

  • Create Anything: Use a large library of customizable objects, shapes, and tools to build intricate levels, creative contraptions, or even entire worlds within a huge build space.

  • Optimized for Creativity: All objects are built to be lightweight, allowing you to create large, complex levels without causing performance issues for you or other players.

  • Seamless Sharing: Create a playlist of your levels and host a lobby. Anyone can join and play instantly, with no need to download your content beforehand.

  • Steam Workshop: You can easily share your creations using Steam Workshop. Here you can also browse other players creations, subscribe, comment and rate them.

Customization

You can customize your character with loads of different options. You can choose from different materials, glows and faces to express your style and personality. You can also unlock new cool decorations by just playing the game.
